name: Samantha Piper
text: The delivery driver was terrific in calling to find the entrance to my building and such, however I had requested contactless and he did not just leave the pizza (waited for my daughter to tell him to leave it there). Otherwise everything was great! - And the new meatless sausage is actually pretty yummy!

name: Steve Martin
text: I ordered extra cheese and extra bacon. We got neither. Lightest pizza ever. Pizza hut has always been my favorite, but this might as well have been a frozen pizza. I even tipped 20%...for what?

name: Steven Pryor
text: The pizzas are good and fresh. I like the dough,toppings and boxing.Staff is always polite. I get a pizza once a month. My last order I ordered extra cheese and it was not on the pizza. I paid $2 extra for it. My dog loves the cheese for a ‚Ä¶More

name: Rachel Domenech
text: Quick, easy, staff was kind.  And quick to bring to my car.

name: Charles Penrow III
text: Fast friendly service.  Food was cooked perfectly as expected.

name: robert barrette
text: Was 50$ for 2 pizzas I paid for double pepperoni on a pepperoni lovers and it was like a normal pepperoni pizza and I said somthing and they said it was double if so they put like 8 pepperoni on a large pizza how is that a pepperoni lovers ????

name: Pablin Santiago
text: Friendly owner and staff. Never had a bad experience ordering from the app or in person definitely worth it.

name: Paul Head
text: Fast but food quality has gone down

name: Theresa N
text: Pizza was hot and made to order.

name: Jessica Romanowitz
text: Fast and friendly service. Delicious pizza. Doesn‚Äôt get any better than that, right? Literally no complaints and the number to this location is on my emergency contacts list. üòÇüòÇüòÇ

name: Nebbishy
text: I live close to here and they deliver quality and delicious pizza and wings, ready and hot and on time. Although there isn't a dine in, it's a great place to get good, fast, quality pizza to bring home to your friends and family.

name: Allyson Taylor
text: I‚Äôm not one to complain but my most recent experience was the absolute worst. I got a pizza that was incorrectly made and when I called to get my order fixed the man on the phone was rude and argumentative and would not fix my pizza. I will never be ordering from the St. Charles Pizza Hut again!!

name: Jeff McMenamin
text:
Others may do pizza better.
No one does pizza more consistently.

name: Luke Cowart
text: Mahummad Shezad, the manager of this Pizza Hut runs a horrible shop.  While no one really expects much from a Pizza Hut, this particular location should be shut down for its condition.   I returned my food immediately after walking in for a ‚Ä¶More

name: Katie Aretos
text: They never follow "special instructions" when order is placed online. Called within thirty seconds of submitting an order to ask for extra sauce and they claimed pizzas were already in the oven. Having worked in restaurants, I'm confident ‚Ä¶More

name: Tom Milauskas
text: the owner/mgr is a saint- he is so helpful when we buy pizza's for our IL Youth Center events on Monday- I even asked him to  donate 4 boxes and the heat bag so I could bring in homemade pizza this week and he was more than happy to help- awesome attitude-

name: Mikee Kuhr
text: Pizza is good, prices are good. What more could you want from a pizza place?

name: M M
text: Like the pizza !

name: Alicia Highstreet
text: Not usually one to complain. And I did call the store and spoke to the general manager before posting this. Just ordered from Pizza Hut off W. Main st. And as soon as I opened a box I saw a bite taken out of it. When I called and spoke to ‚Ä¶More

name: Johnny Tran
text: Love pizza hut no matter where I'm at.

name: Mz L.A
text: I have been eating Pizza Hut since I was a toddler. I can honestly say I had never had a negative experience with the Franchise until I chose to go to this Pizza Hut in St. Charles IL. Not only was the pizza disgusting but when I ‚Ä¶More

name: Antonio Marco
text: They ran out of the medium but were awesome enough to give me the large for the same price!!

name: BillJ
text: I actually find PH as okay for an inexpensive pizza

name: Danielle Di Cosola
text: Fast service.  There was no wait when we went to pick up our food and it was on time.

name: Mike
text: Pizza was ready, but only employee (at 4:20pm) got caught on phones and did not make cinnamon sticks.  Had to wait about 10 minutes...as my pizzas sat in the warmer.  Usually really good service at this location....guess not before 5 pm.

name: Kwik Fix
text: Same food quality every time.. they come thru when you really need to settle down four kids quick

name: Gerry West
text: The pizza was cold and it looked like it was made an hour ago for someone else and was given to me because the one it was made for never came to pick it up. Never again we I get a pizza from pizza hut in St. Charles again.

name: Teka Boshell
text: My son swears the cheese pizza is better at the hut over anywhere else!

name: mark m.
text: This place is about as good as it gets, the staff always gets it done right, best wings around.

name: William Sebold
text: Good pizza

name: Mateusz
text: Good pizza fast

name: Dennis Hood
text: Decent pizza and they get it ready pretty quick. I have to pick up at the store as they don't deliver to my part of Geneva.

name: Mikhail Strubler
text: Good pizza, made quick, decent price

name: Shirley Hall
text: Food is well prepared and the service is excellent! Staff are very friendly.

name: Adam Smith
text: How does a Pizza Hut store Famous for Pan Pizza never have PAN PIZZA..... I mean 3 times in a row now pan pizza and it's only 7.p.m.....

name: Lou Herout
text: They're fast and it's a cute lil shop

name: Kimberly Tigger
text: Great pizza, service and speedy delivery

name: Exadis
text: Called the store and waited on hold for about 15 minutes, then it hung up on me. So i called again and they answered by saying they were closed, even though they were still open for another 25 minutes.

name: Caleb Hoger
text: Great pizza. Love this place

name: Artland
text: Took 2 hours for delivery. Food arrived cold and was missing condiments.

name: Eric Dilling
text: Always had a good experience at this location. Good delivery service too.

name: Jeffrey Hickman
text: Ok pizza and good service

name: Krish Patel
text: Nice service and they tell you if there is a deal

name: Jeremiah Heinicke
text: Garlic knots are bomb! And Breadsticks!

name: Alyssa Anderson
text: They wouldn't deliver to my zip code even though it was the same zip code the place was located

name: Christopher Williams
text: This location doesn't EVER have any deals!!!!!! Better off going to Charley Fox's!!!

name: Melty
text: Last time I ordered from them I had to re heat my food in the microwave and I live less than 5 miles away

name: love love
text: Great food

name: Michael Haughan
text: Wings were pretty good

name: Matt Eden
text: I miss Pizza Hut on St. Charles having sitting room instead of being take out or delivery only. Food meets Pizza Hut standards and has been ready on time every time i order online.
